circumstances: Amanda Read was last seen by a friend at the playground near 5 New Street, Edinburgh. Her absence raised concerns among her friends, leading to the filing of a missing person report. After several days, she was found safe at 1a Beech Grove, Livingston, seemingly disoriented but unharmed. Her familiarity with the areas she frequented might have contributed to her prolonged absence.
